data.title: About: Sagina (film)
data.meta_description: Sagina is a 1974 Hindi film, produced by J. K. Kapur and directed by Tapan Sinha, the film stars Dilip Kumar, Saira Banu, Aparna Sen, Om Prakash. It was a remake of 1970 Bengali movie Sagina Mahato directed by Tapan Sinha with the same lead pair in the cast. This version was a commercial failure, and Dilip Kumar's first consecutive failure in almost three decades since 1945. His last film Dastaan (1972) was also a commercial failure.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Sagina is a 1974 Hindi film, produced by J. K. Kapur and directed by Tapan Sinha, the film stars Dilip Kumar, Saira Banu, Aparna Sen, Om Prakash. It was a remake of 1970 Bengali movie Sagina Mahato directed by Tapan Sinha with the same lead pair in the cast. This version was a commercial failure, and Dilip Kumar's first consecutive failure in almost three decades since 1945. His last film Dastaan (1972) was also a commercial failure. (en)

Sagina adalah sebuah film Hindi 1974, yang diproduksi oleh dan disutradarai oleh Tapan Sinha, film tersebut dibintangi oleh Dilip Kumar, Saira Banu, Aparna Sen dan Om Prakash. Film tersebut merupakan sebuah buat ulang dari film Bengali 1970 yang disutradarai oleh Tapan Sinha. (in)
